Class Liaison

java.lang.Object
  prototype.Liaison
Direct Known Subclasses:
LiaisonLibre, LiaisonSimple, LiaisonTypee
public abstract class Liaison
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class interlinking two data sets according to criteria.

Version:
04042012
Author:
Thibaud Colas
See Also:
Jeu

Method Detail

getCibleData

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String>> getCibleData()
                                                                                        throws QueryEvaluationException,
                                                                                               RepositoryException,
                                                                                               MalformedQueryException
Retrieves data from the target data set which we want to update. One value is associated with multiple URIs, one URI can be associated with multiple values.

Returns:
Hashmap where a value is associated with the URIs having this value for the target predicate.
Throws:
QueryEvaluationException - Issue with the target query.
RepositoryException - Repository error while fetching data.
MalformedQueryException - Wrong query result bindings.

getInterconnexion

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedList<Statement>> getInterconnexion()
                                                                                      throws QueryEvaluationException,
                                                                                             RepositoryException,
                                                                                             MalformedQueryException
Creates new statements with the updated data.

Returns:
A Hashmap containing statements grouped by their subjects.
Throws:
QueryEvaluationException - Issue with one of the queries.
RepositoryException - Repository error while fetching data.
MalformedQueryException - Wrong query result bindings.

getSourceData

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSourceData()
                                                                   throws QueryEvaluationException,
                                                                          RepositoryException,
                                                                          MalformedQueryException
Retrieves data for the source predicate from the source data set. One value = one URI, one URI = one value.

Returns:
HashMap where the key is the value for the source predicate and value is the associated URI (subject).
Throws:
QueryEvaluationException - Issue with the source query.
RepositoryException - Repository error while fetching data.
MalformedQueryException - Wrong query result bindings.

hasCorrectBindingNames

public final boolean hasCorrectBindingNames(TupleQueryResult tqr)
                                     throws QueryEvaluationException
Tels if the bindings of the results are wel-formed.

Parameters:
tqr - : The result of a SPARQL query.
Returns:
True if the results contain solely both SVAR and OVAR columns.
Throws:
QueryEvaluationException - Error while closing the result.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Proper stop of both data sets.

writeQuery

public java.lang.String writeQuery(java.lang.String p)
Writes a SPARQL query to retrieve subject - object pairs for a given predicate.

Parameters:
p - : The predicate to use, including its local namespace.
Returns:
La requête SPARQL finale.

writeQuery

public java.lang.String writeQuery(java.lang.String p,
                                   java.lang.String t)
Writes a SPARQL query to retrieve subject - object pairs for a given predicate. The subject will also be of a given type.

Parameters:
p - : The predicate to use, including its local namespace.
t - : The subject's data type.
Returns:
La requête SPARQL finale.
